meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a factory.
meanings.sent1: The large, factorylike building dominated the skyline.
meanings.sent2: The factorylike structure was filled with machinery and workers.
meanings.sent3: The factorylike cafeteria served meals with assembly line efficiency.
meanings.sent4: Her office was a factorylike hive of activity.
meanings.sent5: The factorylike noise of the machines never seemed to stop.

meanings.definition: Having the appearance or qualities of a factory.
meanings.sent1: The factorylike smokestacks billowed smoke into the sky.
meanings.sent2: The factorylike smell of chemicals lingered in the air.
meanings.sent3: The factorylike efficiency of the team impressed the boss.
meanings.sent4: His factorylike routine never varied from day to day.
meanings.sent5: The factorylike layout of the office made it easy to navigate.
